abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Langos Truck, New York City food truck that serves typical Hungarian food.
lead_paragraph: The food truck, which parks weekdays for lunch at different corners of New York City, proselytizes the power of its namesake offerings.

headline.main: Langos Truck Presents the Flavor of Hungary on Four Wheels
headline.print_headline: The Flavor of Hungary on Four Wheels

snippet: The food truck, which parks weekdays for lunch at different corners of New York City, proselytizes the power of its namesake offerings.
